GapFillInput.Title: Shops and shopping
GapFillInput.Instruction: Choose a word from the word pool. Type your answer in each gap.

Content.Question:
How was my day? Well, I went shopping in town. First I went to the pharmacy and I bought a new toothbrush and some toothpaste. I also got some medicine for Jack. He’s got a bad cold. Then I took some dirty clothes to the dry-cleaners. After that I wanted to get a present for Greta. You know it’s her birthday on Wednesday. I tried Annabel’s, you know, that little gift shop on Maze Lane and I bought her a nice diary. So then I ran to the post office and posted it. It was
1 o’clock by then and I had lunch in Peaches. Then I went to the hairdresser’s to have a haircut. Do you like it? And then I came home. So that’s my day. What about you?
